profile.summary: Developer/architect with international experience building cross-device applications using React Native and React, including the official Australian Open 2020 mobile app, India’s complex indirect tax portal, and digital agriculture solutions.

highlights: Contributing to digitalization of the agriculture sector with mobile and web solutions.
Leveraging React Native/React for cross-device applications.

roles.title: Technology Analyst
responsibilities: Participated in architecture/design decisions and ensured deliverables aligned with architectural requirements.
Handled onsite coordination with customers and program managers to ensure successful delivery.
Developed and reviewed code, documentation, and unit tests; ensured readiness for validation/delivery.
Responded to issues, estimated efforts, implemented solutions/workarounds, and communicated with stakeholders.

roles.title: Technology Analyst
responsibilities: Led web/mobile development initiatives supporting direct and indirect purchasing operations.
Performed impact analysis, high-level design, and created unit test plans for complex modules.
Contributed to estimation, quality adherence, and SLA compliance.

roles.title: Senior Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Developed ReactJS web apps; created implementation plans and supported go-live activities.
Performed validation (functional, integration, system, UX) and contributed to performance testing.

roles.title: Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Worked on complex AngularJS-based government tax portal; served as onsite coordinator.
Prepared and delivered KT sessions; documented understanding and supported transitions.

roles.title: Systems Engineer Trainee
responsibilities: Completed foundational training; received merit recognition for performance.
